name: notself
text: I can't believe this was rated so low

name: serf
text: its run of the mill until you see DATSUN. Then pure sublime genius.

name: pepperhittherim
text: I wholeheartedly agree. People who rate this strip low must not know how fun it is to be with the dudes.

name: buttermoths
text:
Wow, I was going to say exactly the same thing, down to the 'wholeheartedly'. Daaamn!
So yes, I agree. While it doesn't make me laugh or anything, for some reason, while I'm doing something that doesn't require a lot of brain power (crappin', showering, video games etc), my mind wanders to this strip. Don't know why. It's just so...80's-style-HAUNTING.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
80s-style as in "Was it all just a dream?"

I really hope so.

name: daaaaang
text: Yeah there is no reason for such nonsense.  This strip is gold.

name: isaach
text: robot ass.  sublime

name: centipede_damascus
text: BOO TO THAT!

name: straw
text: A comment left by straw was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by subtlet, Courtland, Majuju, deovalente)

name: bug56
text: HOORAY RED STRIPE!

name: achilleselbow
text: How do you know a robot's ass is bad?

name: heccibiggs
text: WHY FIND OUT

name: soticoto
text:
Oh thank you so much for repeating those phrases yet again.

... Like we don't remember the original robot-arse strip.

This is why we can't have nice things.

name: n0umena
text: IT MUST BE

name: nodal
text: BOO TO THAT

name: tripleg
text: I BOO THAT ROBOT ASS AS HIS FATHER

name: n0umena
text: no way man

name: cpnglxynchos
text: an interesting new take on a facehand picture...

name: iloveyoucupcake
text: Not only a robot ass but in a Datsun, who can resist?

name: cailetshadow
text: Not only a robot ass but a Datsun ass. Who can resist?

name: kingsleymc
text: Best part?  They driving a friggin Datsun with no rust.

name: cdtm
text: Also, what sort of metal could Lie Bot be made of, if it can't deflect a bullet like Vlad can?  He's certainly not as sturdy as Vlad.

name: cdtm
text: The above was meant for the last comic.

name: i_love_kate
text: I forget. When does Vlad deflect a bullet?

name: dj_douche
text: when Pat shoots him in the Subway.

name: i_love_kate
text: He doesn't. Roast Beef arrives and Pat spins around and shoots him instead.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Love that continuity.

name: dj_douche
text: are you sure? i thought he shot Vlad but the bullet ricoched and hit Roast Beef.

name: cdl146
text: We don't see enough of the robots these days.

name: checkmatejones
text: I couldn't believe how good this strip was.

name: jonnay
text: Neither could I. (Emphasize the "i" in neither, not the "e" when you read that.)

name: professorhazard
text: I'm afraid I don't understand how we got from the last comic to this comic. Did Lie Bot run out of the ER, all going "whoop-whoop-whoop"?

name: puguglypress
text: He is celebrating because he succeeded in causing trouble

name: nucleargeranium
text: Dang dogg he was hella mooning us.

name: agentj
text: If that truck's green Vlad stoled it from my grampa.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Any strip with Andy is great as far as I'm concerned.

I don't know why, but I have such a soft spot for that big ol' hunk of nondescript cuboid metal. Maybe it's the shoes?

name: zathyr
text: It is your secret fetish.  Don't worry; we the internet will keep it safe.

name: mattylite
text: I love the robot ass!  It is my favorite!  Chubbies all around to everyone who agrees!  I am out of chubbies!  ROBOT ASS!  IT IS HILARIOUS!  LOOK AT IT!

name: mattylite
text: Just to be clear I am talking comedy here, not such as cake-sitting...

name: tekende
text: That does look like a really fun night.

name: possums
text:
Best thing about this comic? Lie Bot just killed Beef and might have just died himself, and yet the next day he's up and mooning bitches on a Datsun.

That is class.

name: alaric101
text: Was it all an elaborate plot to piss off Ray?

name: jhunter
text: never more fun than when you're drunk with the dudes, even if you've just cold shot a guy

name: desert_donkey
text: liebot's ass is the shit.

name: tonyhighwind
text: It just looks like this.
